Room.Name: West Hafnia Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the central shopping district of the City of Hafnia.
Room.LongDescription: More stuff to buy. The supply store has all sort of useful items for the mountaineer. To the south is a potions shop. It doesn't look as fancy as the magic shop in Oceancrest, but the elves are not known for their eccentricity. The road continues to the east and west.
